data.text: I don't want our people to take lists rather take action!!.. @EFFSouthAfrica ward 15.. https://t.co/xpkPQzLmeY

Councillor of Nompumelelo saying "Dept of Housing and Social development will come on Monday" that being 8 days after the fire.. community give 1kg rice, 1kg samp and mealie meal. No shelter was offered.
People have been sleeping outside, there aren't any community halls and schools can't be open to the community. It's been a week since the fire.
1 of the residents here says that in previous times the only help offered has been a small food parcel and those grey blankets with white stripes. .

The most painful thing about this is knowing that these people will rebuild, live here for another presidential term. . 
I lived like this for half my life. . It hurts. .

@MrSilk_D @MbuyiseniNdlozi @FloydShivambu @Julius_S_Malema @eNCA @KeithNgesiRadio Im in the BCMM Regional Office right now. Our secretary and other RCT members are attending to it. I will be joining them soon

I have been here for over an hour walking around and I haven't seen toilets or taps. . 

Nompumelelo location, rough estimation of 45 homes lost in the fire. A disabled man lost his life in the fire after a shack behind him caught fire. His screams were heard a mile away. https://t.co/kgtJs1WYIE
Last frame is what seems like a CV. . https://t.co/PvhMQwxqNC
